text: Martin Havelka (10 July 1958 - 2 October 2020) was a Czech actor. Havelka was born in Karlovy Vary, Czechoslovakia. He was known for his stage roles on the National Theatre Brno and Brno City Theatre. He appeared on Czech productions of Jesus Christ Superstar, My Fair Lady, Mary Poppins and Little Shop of Horrors. Havelka died in a car crash on 2 October 2020 in Brno at the age of 62.Ve věku 62 let zemřel filmový a divadelní herec Martin Havelka.
